bwwExcerpt: "Monsieur" (actually, marine) Chris, the American character central to this drama, is portrayed ably by Anthony Festa, who sings "Why, God, Why" with poignancy and pathos. 17-year-old Vietnamese orphan Kim is played by Emily Bautista (Myra Molloy, in some performances), who elicits our sympathy both for her purity of character and her hopeless plight, all synthesized so well in her beautiful solo "The Movie in My Mind."
